channel.title: SMF 99 Subtype 6 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 99 Subtype 6 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - cpln
item.description: Length of a service class period section Map: SMF99_S6_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF996CPLN Description Length of a service class period section

item.title: Field - cpof
item.description: Offset to service class period section from beginning of record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_S6_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF996CPOF Description Offset to service class period section from beginning of record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - cpon
item.description: Number of service class period sections Map: SMF99_S6_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF996CPON Description Number of service class period sections

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99DTE

item.title: Field - dln
item.description: Length of the data section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DLN Description Length of the data section

item.title: Field - dof
item.description: Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DOF Description Offset to the data section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - don
item.description: Number of data sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99DON Description Number of data sections

item.title: Field - dp
item.description: Dispatching priority of period for next policy interval Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_DP Description Dispatching priority of period for next policy interval

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF. Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99DTE Description Date when the record was moved into the SMF buffer, in the form 0cyydddF.

item.title: Field - eclass_name
item.description: External class name. For an externally defined service class this is the name defined in the service definition. For a server period this name will be of the form $SRMSxxx. For system service classes this name will be $SRMBEST, $SRMDUMP, $SRMGOOD, $SRMDISC, or $SRMQSC. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_ECLASS_NAME Description External class name. For an externally defined service class this is the name defined in the service definition. For a server period this name will be of the form $SRMSxxx.

item.title: Field - ewlm_global_pi
item.description: EWLM global performance index(PI) Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_EWLM_GLOBAL_PI Description EWLM global performance index(PI)

item.title: Field - ewlm_local_pi
item.description: EWLM local performance index(PI) Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_EWLM_LOCAL_PI Description EWLM local performance index(PI)

item.title: Field - ewlm_managed
item.description: Period is managed using EWLM performance data. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: flags Description Period is managed using EWLM performance data. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flags.

item.title: Field - flags
item.description: Flags Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_FLAGS Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description ewlm_managed 0 Period is managed using EWLM performance data. io_priority_group 1 Period belongs to a service class that was assigned to I/O priority group inelighonorpriority 2 Specialty engine work in this period is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. it will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99FLG Description System indicator: Bit 0 reserved, Bit 1 subtypes utilized, Bit 2 reserved, Bits 3-6 version indicators, Bit 7 reserved Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description stu 1 Subtypes utilized

item.title: Field - goaltype
item.description: goal type: 0 - System, SYSSTC, or server goal, 1 - short response time, 2 - long response time, 3 - velocity, 4 - discretionary Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_GOALTYPE Description goal type: 0 - System, SYSSTC, or server goal, 1 - short response time, 2 - long response time, 3 - velocity, 4 - discretionary

item.title: Field - goalval
item.description: goal value: response time goal - goal in milliseconds, velocity - velocity, discretionary, system goal or server period - zero Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_GOALVAL Description goal value: response time goal - goal in milliseconds, velocity - velocity, discretionary, system goal or server period - zero

item.title: Field - iclass_name
item.description: Internal service class name. Same as SMF996_ECLASS_NAME except for discretionary periods. For discretionary periods the name will be of the form $SRMDIxx. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_ICLASS_NAME Description Internal service class name. Same as SMF996_ECLASS_NAME except for discretionary periods. For discretionary periods the name will be of the form $SRMDIxx.

item.title: Field - impor
item.description: Importance of service class period Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_IMPOR Description Importance of service class period

item.title: Field - inelighonorpriority
item.description: Specialty engine work in this period is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. it will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: flags Description Specialty engine work in this period is ineligible for “Honor Priority Processing”, i.e. it will not be offloaded to CPs for help processing. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field flags.

item.title: Field - io_priority_group
item.description: Period belongs to a service class that was assigned to I/O priority group Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: flags Description Period belongs to a service class that was assigned to I/O priority group Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flags.

item.title: Field - iodp
item.description: I/O priority of period for next policy interval Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_IODP Description I/O priority of period for next policy interval

item.title: Field - len
item.description: Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word). Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99LEN Description Record Length. This field and the next field (total of four bytes) form the RDW (record descriptor word).

item.title: Field - local_pi
item.description: local performance index * 100 Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_LOCAL_PI Description local performance index * 100

item.title: Field - mpli
item.description: MPL in-target for next policy interval Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_MPLI Description MPL in-target for next policy interval

item.title: Field - mplo
item.description: MPL out-target for next policy interval Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_MPLO Description MPL out-target for next policy interval

item.title: Field - per_num
item.description: Period number within class Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PER_NUM Description Period number within class

item.title: Field - percentile
item.description: Response time goal percentile. Zero if period does not a percentile response time goal. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PERCENTILE Description Response time goal percentile. Zero if period does not a percentile response time goal.

item.title: Field - pflg
item.description: Record flags Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PFLG Description Record flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description record_incomplete 0 Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte reasm_indicator 1 Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area.

item.title: Field - piserv
item.description: IFA service accumulated during interval Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PISERV Description IFA service accumulated during interval

item.title: Field - pln
item.description: Length of the product section Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99PLN Description Length of the product section

item.title: Field - pnm
item.description: Product Name - SRM Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99PNM Description Product Name - SRM

item.title: Field - pof
item.description: Offset to the product section from the beginning of the record (including RDW) Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99POF Description Offset to the product section from the beginning of the record (including RDW)

item.title: Field - pon
item.description: Number of product sections Map: SMF99_SDEF_MAP Based on: SMF99PON Description Number of product sections

item.title: Field - pserv
item.description: service accumulated during interval Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PSERV Description service accumulated during interval

item.title: Field - psitar
item.description: storage isolation target for next policy interval for each address space in period, valid only for work with short response time goals, zero otherwise. Frame count. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PSITAR Description storage isolation target for next policy interval for each address space in period, valid only for work with short response time goals, zero otherwise. Frame count.

item.title: Field - pspt
item.description: Time swapped out address spaces in period are protected from being swapped to aux for next policy interval. In 1.024 milliseconds. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PSPT Description Time swapped out address spaces in period are protected from being swapped to aux for next policy interval. In 1.024 milliseconds.

item.title: Field - psserv
item.description: accumulated SUP service Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_PSSERV Description accumulated SUP service

item.title: Field - reasm_indicator
item.description: Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area. Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: pflg Description Only a subset of the available data is written to this record. The rest follows in subsequent records. This record contains a reassembly area. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field pflg.

item.title: Field - record_incomplete
item.description: Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: pflg Description Only a subset of the available data was written to avoid that this record gets larger than 32 kByte Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field pflg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: Record type 99 Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99RTY Description Record type 99

item.title: Field - rua
item.description: Average number of ready address spaces over last policy interval. Scaled by * 16 Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_RUA Description Average number of ready address spaces over last policy interval. Scaled by * 16

item.title: Field - rvn
item.description: Record Version Number Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99RVN Description Record Version Number

item.title: Field - sdef_len
item.description: Length of self definition section Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99_SDEF_LEN Description Length of self definition section

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: Segment descriptor (see record length field) Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99SEG Description Segment descriptor (see record length field)

item.title: Field - server_class_name
item.description: NAME OF SERVICE CLASS THAT AT LEAST ONE OF THE SERVER ADDRESS SPACES IN THE SERVER PERIOD REPRESENTED BY THE SUBTYPE 6 ENTRY WAS ORIGINAL CLASSIFIED TO Map: SMF99_S6_SERVER_MAP Based on: SMF99_S6_SERVER_CLASS_NAME Description NAME OF SERVICE CLASS THAT AT LEAST ONE OF THE SERVER ADDRESS SPACES IN THE SERVER PERIOD REPRESENTED BY THE SUBTYPE 6 ENTRY WAS ORIGINAL CLASSIFIED TO

item.title: Field - server_data_ln
item.description: LENGTH OF EACH SERVER SECTION ENTRY Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_SERVER_DATA_LN Description LENGTH OF EACH SERVER SECTION ENTRY

item.title: Field - server_data_of
item.description: Offset to server section from beginning of record (including RDW). Only valid if period is a server period. There will be one server section entry for each different external service class that server address spaces in this server period were originally classified to. Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_SERVER_DATA_OF Description Offset to server section from beginning of record (including RDW). Only valid if period is a server period. There will be one server section entry for each different external service class that server address spaces in this server period were originally classified to.

item.title: Field - server_data_on
item.description: NUMBER OF SERVER SECTION ENTRIES Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_SERVER_DATA_ON Description NUMBER OF SERVER SECTION ENTRIES

item.title: Field - server_per_num
item.description: PERIOD NUMBER WITH IN CLASS Map: SMF99_S6_SERVER_MAP Based on: SMF99_S6_SERVER_PER_NUM Description PERIOD NUMBER WITH IN CLASS

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: System identification (from the SID parameter). Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99SID Description System identification (from the SID parameter).

item.title: Field - slv
item.description: System level from which record was cut (copied from CVTPRODN) Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99SLV Description System level from which record was cut (copied from CVTPRODN)

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name from which record was cut (copied from CVTSNAME) Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99SNM Description System name from which record was cut (copied from CVTSNAME)

item.title: Field - ssid
item.description: Sub System Identification Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99SSID Description Sub System Identification

item.title: Field - stu
item.description: Subtypes utilized Record: SMF99S6 Based on: flg Description Subtypes utilized Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - sysplex_pi
item.description: sysplex performance index * 100 Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_SYSPLEX_PI Description sysplex performance index * 100

item.title: Field - tid
item.description: Record subtype (must be at offset ‘16’X) Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99TID Description Record subtype (must be at offset ‘16’X)

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99TME

item.title: Field - time_at_pdp
item.description: Time at PDP (promoted dispatch priority) accumulator Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_TIME_AT_PDP Description Time at PDP (promoted dispatch priority) accumulator

item.title: Field - time_at_pdp_using
item.description: Time at PDP (promoted dispatch priority) using samples Map: SMF99_S6_PER_MAP Based on: SMF996_TIME_AT_PDP_USING Description Time at PDP (promoted dispatch priority) using samples

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF99S6 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: Time since midnight, in hundreths of a second, that the record was moved into the SMF buffer Record: SMF99S6 Based on: SMF99TME Description Time since midnight, in hundreths of a second, that the record was moved into the SMF buffer

item.title: Field - vn2
item.description: Record sub version. Used to identify changes to the record in the service stream Map: SMF99_PRODUCT_MAP Based on: SMF99VN2 Description Record sub version. Used to identify changes to the record in the service stream
